Articles.Content: Am I the only one who has a favorite Kerbal who isn't Jeb (besides him). I liked Bill, because he was the first Kerbal of  mine to set foot on the Mun. He is still there to this day, but that's besides the point. If it was a randomly generated Kerbal, or if you put yourself in there, reply below, the name, and why they are your favorite. I also like one of my RNG Kerbals, Adbro, and my custom Kerbal Deviin.
Jeb is my main Test pilot, but Val is the Commander of most big missions.

Billy-Bobble and Billy-Bobbles, twins chosen to first interplanetary missions, one stays on Duna, the other orbits around Eve because lander design was a failure.

Also, Chris Kerman, the bravest and stupidest Kerbal I've ever had. He did extreme EVA on Minmus, so that explains his stats.

My fav is Valentina.

 

And the Avatar of the Youtuber called KerbalEssences. Yes, I like puns.
